name: MIS HQ SPU Deliberate Damage Fire Report
description: HQ0003 v1.0 Created for Alpa Dedji. Contains an on-report filter to show 'FIRE' incident types only.

dataset.name: Query 1
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT.REPORT_DATE, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INCIDENT_DATE_, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_TITLE, AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INITCAP(AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.INCIDENT_TYPE_DESC) AS INCIDENT_TYPE FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE, BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT AT_INCIDENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_QUESTION AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_ANSWER AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_STATUS AT_INCIDENT_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_INCIDENT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_INCIDENT_TYPE AT_INCIDENT_TYPE WHERE (AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK = AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_INCIDENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DATE_SK = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_DATE_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK = AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.INCIDENT_QUESTION_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTIONNAIRE.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK = AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.INCIDENT_ANSWER_SK) AND (AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_TYPE.QUESTIONNAIRE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND (AT_INCIDENT_STATUS.INCIDENT_STATUS_ID_NK <> 'DUP') AND ((AT_INCIDENT_QUESTION.QUESTION_DESCRIPTION IN ('WHAT WAS THE LOCATION OF THE INCIDENT') OR 'All' IN ('WHAT WAS THE LOCATION OF THE INCIDENT')) AND ((AT_INCIDENT_ANSWER.ANSWER_DESCRIPTION) IN ('ADMINISTRATION', 'ASSOCIATION AREA', 'CELL', 'CHAPEL', 'CROWN COURT', 'DINING ROOM', 'DORMITORY', 'EDUCATION', 'ELSEWHERE', 'ELSEWHERE (ENTER DETAILS)', 'EXERCISE YARD', 'FUNERAL', 'GATE', 'GYM', 'HEALTH CARE CENTRE', 'HOSPITAL OUTSIDE (PATIENT)', 'HOSPITAL OUTSIDE (VISITING)', 'KITCHEN', 'MAGISTRATES COURT', 'OFFICE', 'OUTSIDE WORKING PARTY', 'RECEPTION', 'RECESS', 'SEGREGATION UNIT', 'SHOWERS/CHANGING ROOM', 'SPECIAL UNIT', 'SPECIFY', 'SPORTS FIELD', 'VEHICLE', 'VISITS', 'WEDDINGS', 'WING', 'WITHIN PERIMETER', 'WORKS DEPARTMENT', 'WORKSHOP')) AND ((TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_DATE.DAY_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY')) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2010 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('31-01-2010 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, AREA_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, REPORT_DATE, INCIDENT_DATE_, INCIDENT_TITLE, INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INCIDENT_TYPE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE INCIDENT_TYPE = 'Fire')
